text.div:
Mapping from Swissmedic code for vaccine code to Snomed CT for vaccine code

DRAFT. Published on 2023-06-29 17:17:43+0200 by HL7 Switzerland (HL7 Switzerland: https://www.hl7.ch/). This artefact includes content from SNOMED Clinical Terms® (SNOMED CT®) which is copyright of the International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO). Implementers of these artefacts must have the appropriate SNOMED CT Affiliate license - for more information contact http://www.snomed.org/snomed-ct/getsnomed-ct or info@snomed.org.
